response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item carries a special value to me, but I understand its true worth may be different for you. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product at a price of $15,000. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and interests. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
